attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE pay good money for a BBC TV Licence. Foul language should not be allowed at any time on a TV service, that we pay for. Children hear it and copy what they hear, never mind about the "watershed" excuse. If the language is no better than a "free" channel, then why should we pay for it. Please sign my petition if you agree.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/FairpayTV/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
